short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record, organize, and track your coding journey with CodeRecord.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of losing track of all the coding problems you've solved? Introducing CodeRecord,  a free Chrome extension that helps programmers organize and track their coding problems. With CodeRecord, you can easily record your solved problems and add helpful hints and reminders for future reference.

CodeRecord automatically records all the coding problems you solve, so you don't have to worry about forgetting them. The dashboard also allows you to search, filter, and sort your problems, so you can easily find the ones you're looking for.

But that's not all â€“ CodeRecord also allows you to add hints to each problem, making it easier to understand the solution and remember the key concepts. And if you need a little extra help, you can set reminders to revisit the problem at a later date.

So why wait? Sign up for CodeRecord today and take your coding game to the next level.
